name: big-brain-backchannel
description: A text chat server developed in React JS, Node Express, [D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[Dusing React JS, Node Express, Heroku Postgres, and styled with Material-UI
